description: Detects suspicious processes logging on with explicit credentials Author: oscd.community, Teymur Kheirkhabarov @HeirhabarovT, Zach Stanford @svch0st. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Administrators that use the RunAS command or scheduled tasks
name: Suspicious Remote Logon with Explicit Credentials
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND (winlog.event_id:"4648" AND winlog.event_data.ProcessName:(*\\cmd.exe OR *\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe OR *\\winrs.exe OR *\\wmic.exe OR *\\net.exe OR *\\net1.exe OR *\\reg.exe)) AND (NOT (TargetServerName:"localhost")))
